title: Vault integrations with Dell, GitHub, Rubrik, Veza, and more strengthen customer security
content:
HashiCorp’s approach to identity-based security provides a solid foundation for companies to protect, connect, and inspect infrastructure, applications, and data in multi-cloud environments. The nine new Vault partner integrations highlighted here extend the HashiCorp ecosystem into even more security use cases.

HCP Vault Dedicated

HCP Vault Dedicated is a hosted version of Vault Enterprise secrets management service operated by HashiCorp to allow organizations to get up and running quickly. There is a new HCP Vault Dedicated integration from Real-Time Innovations:

Real-Time Innovations

Real-Time Innovations (RTI) is an infrastructure software company known for creating smart-world systems. RTI Connext is the organization's software framework for intelligent distributed systems. Their Vault integration allows users to leverage HashiCorp Vault to deploy and rotate pre-shared keys when using Connext with built-in lightweight security plugins.

HCP Vault Radar

HCP Vault Radar automates the detection and identification of unmanaged secrets in your code so that security teams can take appropriate actions to remediate issues. There is a new HCP Vault Radar integration from GitHub:

GitHub

GitHub,Inc. is a provider of Internet hosting for software development and version control using Git. A new integration for HCP Vault Radar introduces GitHub CLI as a CI/CD pipeline scanning source for Radar’s code scanning capabilities.

Vault Enterprise integrations

We’re pleased to announce five new Vault Enterprise integrations:

Dell

Dell Technologies provides customers with a broad set of innovative technology and service portfolios for the data era. For their Dell PowerProtect DDOS platform, a high-speed, scalable backup and recovery system, they have a new Vault KMIP integration for external key management. Vault supplies the critical keys that encrypt data at rest while also enabling customers to maintain control of their own encryption keys.

Keyrunner

Keyrunner provides an API client that offers a local-first approach tailored for developers who prioritize security and performance. The company's newly released Vault integration allows users to pull secrets from Vault, which streamlines the API development and testing lifecycles by enabling efficient management of secrets and environment variables.

Mindflow

Mindflow leverages GenAI to deliver powerful automation for cybersecurity, IT, and cloud teams, enhancing efficiency. The company has completed a new Vault Enterprise integration to automate development by streamlining authentication and enhance security workflows by capitalizing on credentials supplied from Vault in Mindflow’s no-code/low-code automation platform.

Rubrik

Rubrik enables enterprises to maximize value from data that is increasingly fragmented across datacenters and the cloud. They have released a new Rubrik CDM KMIP integration with Vault that leverages Vault Enterprise as an EKMS for the Rubrik CDM backup, recovery, and compliance platform. Rubrik customers can thus maintain control of their own vital encryption keys (key encryption and self-encrypting drive keys) and protect them while at rest.

Veza

Veza provides a unified Access Platform, bringing together all identities across all systems for sophisticated access search, actionable intelligence, automated access reviews, and seamless identity lifecycle management. Their new Vault Integration brings out-of-the-box transparency and insights for key use cases, including Intelligent Access Monitoring and Non-Human Identity Management (NHI). Vault Enterprise customers benefit from a simple, centralized way to understand Vault usage and communicate risk and compliance requirements back to the business.

Vault Community Edition integrations

We’re pleased to announce a pair of new HashiCorp Vault Community Edition integrations:

Fortinet

Fortinet, secures large enterprises, service providers, and government organizations, empowering its customers with intelligent protection across expanding attack surfaces. The FortiSOAR integration with Vault facilitates automated incident responses through FortiSOAR by using Vault to provide access to compromised application environments so that FortiSOAR can remediate potentially devastating application compromises.

walt.id

walt.id provides tools for digital identity and wallet infrastructure. They released a new Vault Community integration that allows organizations who use walt.id’s open source or managed service identity and wallet solutions to use Vault’s transit secrets engine to sign and verify credentials, all while keeping wallet keys secure within Vault .

Join the Vault Integration Program

To learn more about the Vault Integration Program and apply to become a validated partner, please visit our Become a Partner page.
